mapper.update: UPDATE USER_T SET AUTOLOGIN_ID = NULL , AUTOLOGIN_EXPIRED_AT = NULL WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}
mapper.select: SELECT USER_ID FROM USER_T WHERE AUTOLOGIN_ID = #{autologinId} AND AUTOLOGIN_EXPIRED_AT > SYSDATE
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SLEEP_USER_T ( USER_NO , USER_ID , USER_PASSWORD , USER_NAME , USER_GENDER , USER_EMAIL , USER_MOBILE , USER_BIRTHYEAR , USER_BIRTHDATE , POSTCODE , ROAD_ADDRESS , JIBUN_ADDRESS , DETAIL_ADDRESS , EXTRA_ADDRESS , AGREECODE , JOINED_AT , PW_MODIFIED_AT , SLEPT_AT ) (SELECT U.USER_NO , U.USER_ID , U.USER_PASSWORD , U.USER_NAME , U.USER_GENDER , U.USER_EMAIL , U.USER_MOBILE , U.USER_BIRTHYEAR , U.USER_BIRTHDATE , U.POSTCODE , U.ROAD_ADDRESS , U.JIBUN_ADDRESS , U.DETAIL_ADDRESS , U.EXTRA_ADDRESS , U.AGREECODE , U.JOINED_AT , U.PW_MODIFIED_AT , SYSDATE FROM USER_T U LEFT OUTER JOIN USER_ACCESS_T UA ON U.USER_ID = UA.USER_ID WHERE MONTHS_BETWEEN(SYSDATE, UA.LAST_LOGIN_AT) >= 12 OR (MONTHS_BETWEEN(SYSDATE, U.JOINED_AT) >= 12 AND UA.LAST_LOGIN_AT IS NULL))
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM USER_T WHERE USER_ID IN(SELECT U.USER_ID FROM USER_T U LEFT OUTER JOIN USER_ACCESS_T UA ON U.USER_ID = UA.USER_ID WHERE MONTHS_BETWEEN(SYSDATE, UA.LAST_LOGIN_AT) >= 12 OR (MONTHS_BETWEEN(SYSDATE, U.JOINED_AT) >= 12 AND UA.LAST_LOGIN_AT IS NULL))
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER_T ( USER_NO , USER_ID , USER_PASSWORD , USER_NAME , USER_GENDER , USER_EMAIL , USER_MOBILE , USER_BIRTHYEAR , USER_BIRTHDATE , POSTCODE , ROAD_ADDRESS , JIBUN_ADDRESS , DETAIL_ADDRESS , EXTRA_ADDRESS , AGREECODE , JOINED_AT , PW_MODIFIED_AT ) (SELECT USER_NO , USER_ID , USER_PASSWORD , USER_NAME , USER_GENDER , USER_EMAIL , USER_MOBILE , USER_BIRTHYEAR , USER_BIRTHDATE , POSTCODE , ROAD_ADDRESS , JIBUN_ADDRESS , DETAIL_ADDRESS , EXTRA_ADDRESS , AGREECODE , JOINED_AT , PW_MODIFIED_AT FROM SLEEP_USER_T WHERE USER_ID = #{userId})
